name: Vamps Witches and Wolves!
description:
In Vamps Witches and Wolves you are tasked with hunting down all the monsters in a nearby village, but all of them are disguised as peasants. Keep your eyes peeled, it could be any one of them!

Controls are:

Left/Right arrows- Move left or right

Z- Attack a Vampire with your stake!

X- Shoot a Werewolf with your silver bullet!

C-Melt a Witch by throwing a bucket of water on them!
